I am a first year Ph.D student in the Department of Electrical Engineering at University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign where I am being advised by Prof. Yuliy Baryshnikov.

I graduated with a Dual degree (B.Tech + M.Tech) in Mechanical Engineering from the Indian Institute of Technology Bombay where I was advised by Prof. Debasish Chatterjee and Prof. Ravi Banavar in the Department of Systems and Control Engineering.

My research focuses on various mathematical aspects of optimization, control and learning.
